channel.title: Sample data on rmoff's random ramblings
channel.description: Recent content in Sample data on rmoff's random ramblings

item.title: Some of my favourite public data sets
item.description: Readers of a certain age and RDBMS background will probably remember northwind, or HR, or OE databases - or quite possibly not just remember them but still be using them. Hardcoded sample data is fine, and it’s great for repeatable tutorials and examples - but it’s boring as heck if you want to build an example with something that isn’t using the same data set for the 100th time.
